projects.title: RESTful Blog API
projects.description: A robust backend API handling user authentication, CRUD operations for blog posts, and comment management. Designed for scalability.

sections.progress: Set up Django project structure with Django REST Framework. Implemented user authentication using JWT tokens. Created models for User, BlogPost, and Comment with proper relationships. Built serializers for data validation and API endpoints for CRUD operations.
sections.challenges: Handling nested serializers for comments within blog posts while maintaining good performance. Setting up proper permission classes for different user roles.
sections.solutions: Implemented custom permission classes and used select_related/prefetch_related for optimized database queries. Created separate serializers for list and detail views.
sections.learnings: Deepened understanding of DRF's authentication system and how to structure RESTful APIs following best practices.

projects.title: Dynamic Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, dynamic portfolio with monthly project tracking, real-time updates, and admin authentication. Features smooth animations and dark mode.

sections.progress: Developed a custom update system using JSON file storage and Next.js API routes. Integrated a secure admin panel for real-time project logging and case study management.
sections.challenges: Implementing seamless authentication for the admin panel without a full database while maintaining security for sensitive endpoints.
sections.solutions: Used a combination of local storage auth tokens and server-side validation. Built a dynamic routing system for automated case study page generation.
sections.learnings: Mastered Next.js App Router patterns and specialized in building efficient, data-driven static-first applications with dynamic admin capabilities.

projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: A modern, interactive task management dashboard with drag-and-drop Kanban boards, real-time updates, and advanced filtering. Features beautiful animations and dark mode.

projects.title: Notification Service API
projects.description: A scalable notification service supporting multiple channels (email, SMS, push, WebSocket). Features queuing, retry logic, and delivery tracking with real-time status updates.

projects.title: Weather API Wrapper
projects.description: A proxy service for 3rd party weather APIs that implements caching to reduce rate limits and improve response times.

projects.title: Glassmorphic Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A visually stunning weather dashboard using the glassmorphism trend. Shows real-time data fetched from our wrapper.

projects.title: Recipe API & Search
projects.description: A complex data API allowing users to search recipes by ingredients. Utilizes advanced querying capabilities of Supabase.

projects.title: Particle System Generator
projects.description: A canvas-based generator for creating dynamic particle backgrounds. Users can export configurations for their own sites.
